name: SNClassificationResult
desc: A result that contains the highest-ranking classifications in a time range.

items.name: var timeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time span that corresponds to the result’s classifications.

items.name: var classifications: [SNClassification]
items.desc: A sorted array of the request’s top classification candidates.

items.name: class SNClassification
items.desc: A type that pairs a sound classifier’s prediction with its confidence in that prediction.

items.name: func classification(forIdentifier: String) -> SNClassification?
items.desc: Returns the classification for an identifier.
